title: Gladstone Street Pizza
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Pizza, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Pizzeria and bar lounge. Began offering Daiya vegan cheese in 2015. Has a vegan Caesar salad and antipasta options such as olives, artichoke hearts, and pickled vegetables that can be ordered individually or together as an antipasta plate. A section of the restaurant allows minors. The atmosphere is relaxed and quirky with one wall is covered with a giant mural.
